text: Headingley Stadium is a stadium in the Headingley area of Leeds, West Yorkshire. The stadiums has two sides. One side is used for cricket and the other side is used for rugby. It is used for cricket by Yorkshire County Cricket Club, rugby league by the Leeds Rhinos and rugby union by Leeds Carnegie. Category:Sports buildings in the United Kingdom Category:Buildings and structures in Leeds Category:Rugby league Category:Cricket grounds in England and Wales
title: Headingley Stadium
